name: Squats
tips: Hinge at the hip and reach back as if you're sitting in a chair.
Keep your knees tracking with your second and third toe. Don't let them cave in!
Keep weight mostly in the heels.

name: Calf Raises
tips: Squeeze the calves at the top.
Do this off a step to increase the challenge.

name: Split Squats - Left
tips: Be sure to keep feet shoulder width apart.
Hinge at the hips, not the back.
Make sure your knee is tracking with your second and third toe.
Shift more of your weight into your front heel.

name: Split Squats - Right
tips: Be sure to keep feet shoulder width apart.
Hinge at the hips, not the back.
Make sure your knee is tracking with your second and third toe.
Shift more of your weight into your front heel.

name: Rows
tips: Relax your shoulders (don't let them shrug up).
Tighten your core.
Keep your arms by your ribs.
Squeeze your shoulder blades together.

name: Tricep Extensions
tips: Keep your elbows by your ribs.
Your elbows should not move in space during the extension.

name: Pushups
tips: Place your hands on a stable surface (like the floor or sturdy furniture) so that they are in line with your shoulders.
Keep a flat back and neutral spine.
Don't forget to engage your core.

name: Sumo Squats
tips: Stand with your feet wider than shoulder width, and toes angled outward slightly.
Hinge at your hips, bend your knees, and squat down until your thighs approach parallel to the floor.
This is more of an upright position compared to the regular squat.

name: Hip Hinges
tips: The movement is all driven from your hips!
Try to push your hips back as if you are closing a door with your butt.
Push your heels into the floor and squeeze your glutes as you come up.
Keep your knees slightly bent.

name: Lunges - Left
tips: Be sure to keep feet shoulder width apart.
Hinge at the hip, not the back.
Make sure your knee is tracking with your second and third toe.
Shift more of your weight into your front heel.

name: Lunges - Right
tips: Be sure to keep feet shoulder width apart.
Hinge at the hip, not the back.
Make sure your knee is tracking with your second and third toe.
Shift more of your weight into your front heel.

name: Pull Downs
tips: Bring the band handles down to your chin height.
Think of pulling from your armpits, not your elbows.
Don't forget to engage your core.

name: Straight Arm Pull Downs
tips: Hinge forward slightly at the hip.
Pull your arms straight back behind you, keeping your arms straight.
Squeeze your shoulder blades and feel this in your triceps as you hold it.
